Black proteins are unenriched in respect to both probes; Purple proteins are "enriched" with respect to only the probe on the x-axis; Green proteins are "enriched" with respect to only the probe on the y-axis; and Orange proteins are "enriched" in both probes. Depicted are only the proteins present in the datasets of both probes.
